WorkItem.Description: Attached is an XLS file generated with OOCalc 2.4.1. I am reading it using PHPExcel 1.7.2. When I call PHPExcel_Worksheet::getComments() on Sheet 1, I receive an empty array. Am I doing something wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: Support for comments in Excel5 reader/writer

Comments.Message:
You are doing nothing wrong. It is Excel5 writer that doesn't support comments.

Will change to feature request.

PHPExcel_Worksheet::getComments() missed a comment
>> Support for comments in Excel5 reader/writer
Bump. Any possibility of seeing this feature scheduled?

Cell Comments/Annotations now supported by Readers for all spreadsheet file formats that can contain them... Excel2007, Excel5 (both BIFF5-7 and BIFF8, which have different structures for cell annotations), Excel2003XML, OOCalc and Gnumeric. Only plain text for most formats.
MarkBaker, have you got some works on Excel5 writer for comments ?
I've not implemented any code for writing cell comments for Excel5 at all, the only changes that I've made so far were for reading cell comments.

This is my work on comment writer in Excel5. I try it again and again but don't success.
If someone can find the solution with this start, go it :)

Good luck
